Name: The Zombie Smasher
About the game: Zombies, zombies and more zombies. Looks like you're the only one human left and if you don't want to become a zombie, you will have only one escape from all this madness. Get behind the wheel and crush all zombies to the last! Game features: - 8 post-apocalyptic vehicles to choose - Upgrade system to be the Zombie Smasher :) - 15 levels to play - 4 maps
